overview: The story of the Holy Defender — a young girl named Vartaxaklahun Pakarnusta (Vortex). She is a descendant of an ancient lineage, her family has been the Holy Guardians for many generations. Now, with the help of the sacred shakraim, she needs to fulfill the duty of a Guardian and oust the invaders from the island. An animated 2D in-game movie for an action adventure game. Developer studio - Allods Team Arcade, publisher — My.Games.
title: Character Representation — Vortex
